testcase.name: listArchivedFilms returns no archived films when ArrayList is empty()
saving and loading an loaded collection in JSON doesn't loose data()
listAllFilms returns No Films Stored message when ArrayList is empty()
listActiveFilms returns active films when ArrayList has active films stored()
listFilmsBySelectedRating returns no films when no films of that rating exist()
listActiveFilms returns no active films when ArrayList is empty()
adding a Film to an empty list adds to ArrayList()
listAllFilms returns Films when ArrayList has films stored()
adding a Film to a populated list adds to ArrayList()
listFilmsBySelectedRating returns all films that match that rating when films of that rating exist()
listFilmsBySelectedRating returns No Films when ArrayList is empty()
listArchivedFilms returns archived films when ArrayList has archived films stored()
saving and loading an empty collection in JSON doesn't crash app()
